alert.note: Alert for Lane; Scott (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Scott and northwestern Lane Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 715 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Scott State Lake, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Scott State Lake around 725 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Healy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for west central Kansas.
